languages.text: "Ценой тысяч и тысяч душ? Нет. Тайны, раскрытые такой платой, сами по себе — скверна, пятнающая душу и ведущая к гибели".

traits.locale_text: "Ценой тысяч и тысяч душ? Нет. Тайны, раскрытые такой платой, сами по себе — скверна, пятнающая душу и ведущая к гибели".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."
languages.original_text: "Ценой тысяч и тысяч душ? Нет. Тайны, раскрытые такой платой, сами по себе — скверна, пятнающая душу и ведущая к гибели".

traits.locale_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Für den Preis von Tausenden und Abertausenden von Seelen? Nein. Um diesen Preis enthüllte Geheimnisse sind in sich selbst korrupt, beflecken die Seele und führen in den Untergang."
languages.original_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."

traits.locale_text: "Für den Preis von Tausenden und Abertausenden von Seelen? Nein. Um diesen Preis enthüllte Geheimnisse sind in sich selbst korrupt, beflecken die Seele und führen in den Untergang."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Au prix de milliers de vies ? Non. Les secrets aussi chèrement payés sont source de corruption, ils souillent l'âme et mènent à la ruine. »
languages.original_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."

traits.locale_text: « Au prix de milliers de vies ? Non. Les secrets aussi chèrement payés sont source de corruption, ils souillent l'âme et mènent à la ruine. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿A cambio de miles y miles de almas? No. Cualquier secreto descubierto a semejante precio es en sí mismo una forma de corrupción que mancha el alma y conduce a la ruina».
languages.original_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."

traits.locale_text: «¿A cambio de miles y miles de almas? No. Cualquier secreto descubierto a semejante precio es en sí mismo una forma de corrupción que mancha el alma y conduce a la ruina».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “以成千上万的灵魂为代价？不行。以这种代价揭开的秘密本身就是一种腐化，它玷污了灵魂，带来了毁灭。”
languages.original_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."

traits.locale_text: “以成千上万的灵魂为代价？不行。以这种代价揭开的秘密本身就是一种腐化，它玷污了灵魂，带来了毁灭。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「何千、何万の魂を犠牲にして？いいや。そのような代償を払ってまで暴かれた秘密は、それ自体が腐敗であり、魂を汚し、破滅へと導くものです」
languages.original_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."

traits.locale_text: 「何千、何万の魂を犠牲にして？いいや。そのような代償を払ってまで暴かれた秘密は、それ自体が腐敗であり、魂を汚し、破滅へと導くものです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Binlerce can karşılığında mı? Olmadığımız daha iyi. Böylesi bedellerin karşılığında ortaya çıkarılan sırlar, yozluğun ta kendisidir. Ruhu kirletir, felakete önayak olur."
languages.original_text: "At the cost of thousands upon thousands of souls? No. Secrets uncovered at such a price are corruption unto themselves, staining the soul and leading to ruin."

traits.locale_text: "Binlerce can karşılığında mı? Olmadığımız daha iyi. Böylesi bedellerin karşılığında ortaya çıkarılan sırlar, yozluğun ta kendisidir. Ruhu kirletir, felakete önayak olur."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
